Name: LU 781 - Zoning, 261 Walton Avenue Rezoning, Bronx (C 200286 ZMX)
Title: Resolution approving the decision of the City Planning Commission on ULURP No. C 200286 ZMX, a Zoning Map amendment (L.U. No. 781).

History.Description: This Resolution was Approved by Committee
A motion was made that this Resolution be Approved, by Council approved by consent Roll Call.

Minutes of the Stated Meeting - May 27, 2021

{\rtf1\fbidis\ansi\ansicpg1252\deff0\deflang1033\deflangfe1033{\fonttbl{\f0\froman\fprq2\fcharset0 Times New Roman;}{\f1\fnil\fprq2\fcharset0 Courier;}}
{\colortbl ;\red0\green0\blue0;}
\viewkind4\uc1
\v0\par
\b By Council Members Salamanca and Moya\b0\par
\par
\pard\ltrpar\qj\tab WHEREAS, Mott Haven Gateway, LLC, \expndtw-6 filed an application \expndtw0 pursuant to Sections 197-c and 201 of the New York City Charter for an amendment of the Zoning Map, Section No. 6a, \lang1024 eliminating a Special Mixed Use District (MX-13), changing from an M1-4/R6A District to an R8A District, and establishing within the proposed R8A District a C2-4 District, \lang1033 which in conjunction with the related action would facilitate the construction of a 12-story mixed-use development with 190 units of affordable housing, 48 of which would be permanently affordable, at 261 Walton Avenue in the Lower Concourse neighborhood of the Bronx, Community District 1 (ULURP No. C 200286 ZMX), (the \ldblquote Application\rdblquote );\par
\pard\ltrpar\fi720\qj\tx720\tx3420\par
\pard\ltrpar\fi720\qj\tx720 WHEREAS, the City Planning Commission filed with the Council on April 26, 2021, its decision dated April 21, 2021 (the "Decision") on the Application;\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx720\tx1440\tx2160\tqr\tx9360\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx810\tab WHEREAS, the Application is related to application N 200287 ZRX (L.U. No. 782), a zoning text amendment to designate a Mandatory Inclusionary Housing (MIH) area;\par
\pard\ltrpar\fi720\qj\tx720\par
WHEREAS, the Decision is subject to review and action by the Council pursuant to Section 197-d of the City Charter;\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\fi720\qj\tx720 WHEREAS, upon due notice, the Council held a public hearing on the Decision and Application on May 4, 2021;\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\fi720\qj\tx720 WHEREAS, the Council has considered the land use and other policy issues relating to the Decision and Application; and\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\fi720\qj\tx720 WHEREAS, the Council has considered the relevant environmental issues, including the negative declaration issued November 16\super th\nosupersub , 2020 (CEQR No. 20DCP156X ), which includes an (E) designation to avoid the potential for significant adverse impacts related to air quality and hazardous materials (E-590) (the \ldblquote Negative Declaration\rdblquote ).\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\tx0\tx720\tx1260\tx1440\tx1620  \par
RESOLVED:\par
\par
\pard\ltrpar\fi720\qj\tx720 The Council finds that the action described herein will have no significant impact on the environment as set forth in the (E) Designation (E-590) and Negative Declaration.\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\fi720\qj\tx720 Pursuant to Sections 197-d and 200 of the City Charter and on the basis of the Decision and Application, and based on the environmental determination and consideration described in the report, C 200286\fs22  ZMX\fs24 , incorporated by reference herein, and the record before the Council, the Council approves the Decision of the City Planning Commission.\par
\pard\ltrpar\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\ri140\qj\tx720\tx7560 The Zoning Resolution of the City of New York, effective as of December 15, 1961, and as subsequently amended, is further amended by changing the Zoning Map, Section No. 6a: \par
\par
\pard\ltrpar\fi-720\li720\qj\tx720 1.\tab eliminating a Special Mixed Use District (MX-13) bounded by a line 200 feet southwesterly of East 140\super th\nosupersub  Street, Walton Avenue, a line 100 feet northeasterly of East 138\super th\nosupersub  Street, and Major Deegan Boulevard; \par
\pard\ltrpar\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\fi-720\li720\qj\tx720 2. \tab changing from an M1-4/R6A District to an R8A District property bounded by a line 200 feet southwesterly of East 140\super th\nosupersub  Street, Walton Avenue, a line 100 feet northeasterly of East 138\super th\nosupersub  Street, and Major Deegan Boulevard; and\par
\pard\ltrpar\li1080\qj\f1\par
\pard\ltrpar\fi-720\li720\qj\tx720\f0 3.\tab establishing within the proposed R8A District a C2-4 District bounded by a line 200 feet southwesterly of East 140\super th\nosupersub  Street, Walton Avenue, a line 100 feet northeasterly of East 138\super th\nosupersub  Street, and Major Deegan Boulevard;\par
\pard\ltrpar\fi-720\li720\qj\tx720\tx810\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\ri140\qj\tx720\tx7560\cf1 as shown on a diagram (for illustrative purposes only) dated November 16, 2020, and subject to the conditions of CEQR Declaration E-590, Borough of the Bronx, Community District 1.\cf0\par
\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj Adopted.\par
\par
\tab Office of the City Clerk,\}\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi720\qj The City of New York,\} ss.:\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qj\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\fi1440\qj I hereby certify that the foregoing is a true copy of a Resolution passed by The Council of The City of New York on May 27, 2021, on file in this office.\par
\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\par
\par

\pard\ltrpar\nowidctlpar\qr .....................................................\par
City Clerk, Clerk of The Council\par
